name: HANCHO
description:
HANCHO is a turn-based RPG operating system that allows you to build and battle teams composed of real-world professionals!

Inspired by online battle systems like Pokemon Showdown, HANCHO puts you in the manager's chair and lets you customize every detail of your team and its members. After creating the perfect team, jump into training to test them against AI opponents, or go online to battle against your peers!

Featured Applications:


  • Team Building®: A fully realized team-builder that allows you to customize teams composed of various real-world professions, including Teacher, Senator, Detective, Journalist, and more!
  • Corporate Training®: Test your office-ready teams against patented AI opponent technology!
  • Office Tower®: Battle increasingly difficult teams, all for the glory of the top floor!
  • Corporate Ladder®: Challenge others in competitive seasons of ranked online multiplayer!
